alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 4:39AM MST until February 03 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Far Northeast Highlands, Harding County and Union County. * WHEN...Until Noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-25. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bitterly cold temperatures are also expected this morning with low temperatures in the single digits above and below zero. Wind chill values as low as -20 are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Union County
